tracks.title: Root
tracks.description: Origin for upgrades, fixes, and network rescues

tracks.title: Lease Admin
tracks.description: Origin able to force slot leases

tracks.title: Small Tipper
tracks.description: Origin able to spend up to 250 KSM from the treasury at once

tracks.title: Big Tipper
tracks.description: Origin able to spend up to 1,000 KSM from the treasury at once

tracks.title: Small Spender
tracks.description: Origin able to spend up to 10,000 KSM from the treasury at once

tracks.title: Medium Spender
tracks.description: Origin able to spend up to 100,000 KSM from the treasury at once

tracks.title: Big Spender
tracks.description: Origin able to spend up to 1,000,000 KSM from the treasury at once

tracks.title: Treasurer
tracks.description: Origin for spending (any amount of) funds until the upper limit of 10,000,000 KSM

tracks.title: Whitelisted Caller
tracks.description: Origin commanded by members of the Kusama Fellowship

tracks.title: Fellowship Admin
tracks.description: Origin for managing the composition of the fellowship
